definition: to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of
"ice" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 15), occurring in 冰[bing1], 次[ci4] etc, known as 兩點水|两点水[liang3 dian3 shui3]
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
norm/standard/standard of reference/base/base point/base line/benchmark/reference point/reference frame/criterion/data
to aim at/to target/to point at/to be directed at/registration/alignment (mechanical engineering)

sentences.english: Semi-precious stones were used for inlay ornamentation.
sentences.chinese: 准宝石的石头用来做镶嵌装饰。

sentences.english: Finally, the accuracy analysis of the quasi-plumb line reproduced by the device is demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 最后，给出了装置复现的准铅垂线的准确度分析。

sentences.english: Chapter V, studies of the formation mechanism of the tourism quasi-tourists market.
sentences.chinese: 第五章，研究旅游准市场的形成机理。

sentences.english: The cost compensation for quasi-public goods has been the focus of attention in public finance circles.
sentences.chinese: 准公共产品的成本补偿一直是财政界关注的一个问题。

sentences.english: Not so long ago I was an expectant father.
sentences.chinese: 不久以前我还是一名准爸爸。

sentences.english: The demons begged Jesus to let them go into them, and he gave them permission.
sentences.chinese: 鬼央求耶稣，准他们进入猪里去。

sentences.english: A wavelet-based electrocardiogram data semi-lossless compression algorithm was proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基于小波变换的心电信号准无损压缩算法。

sentences.english: The phenomenon of "quasi-overload" has been found in the experiments.
sentences.chinese: 实验还发现了所谓的“准超负荷”的现象。

sentences.english: The easy route is to have a simple password that works everywhere. Unfortunately, this can be a problem.
sentences.chinese: 你可以图方便设置统一的密码，但这么干，准会出事。

sentences.english: Atcheson's company and its competitors screen the driving records of prospective borrowers.
sentences.chinese: 艾奇逊的公司和屏幕准借款人的驾驶记录其竞争对手。

sentences.english: An example of quasi-contract can be found in the Wikipedia website .
sentences.chinese: 有关准合约的例子，请参阅维基百科。

sentences.english: The research of tourism quasi-market is raised in order to resolve the issue.
sentences.chinese: 旅游准市场的研究就是为了解决这种问题而提出的。

sentences.english: A man with "expectant father" written all over him.
sentences.chinese: 一个身上插满“准爸爸”标签的男人。

sentences.english: The coarse waste can be automatically excluded; the operation is auto metical.
sentences.chinese: 杂质粗料自动排除，可以实现准自动化作业。

sentences.english: Drawing sketches is the basic drill of future engineers.
sentences.chinese: 画图纸是这些准工程师的基础功。

sentences.english: A quasilinear equation is one in which the highest-order derivative appears linearly .
sentences.chinese: 最高阶导数线性地出现的那种方程是准线性方程。

definition: variant of 確|确[que4]/variant of 埆[que4]
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
to cut into/to incise/to penetrate deeply into (a topic, area etc)/cut (offensive moves in basketball)
lit. one hundred shots, one hundred hits/to carry out a task with great precision/to shoot with unfailing accuracy/be a crack shot (idiom)
to grasp (also fig.)/to seize/to hold/assurance/certainty/sure (of the outcome)
mistake/wrong/bad/interlocking/complex/to grind/to polish/to alternate/to stagger/to miss/to let slip/to evade/to inlay with gold or silver
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
